genre_description: Near-future social drama focusing on diaspora family dynamics, artistic identity, and supportive AI technology.

ai_characters.name: Lumi
ai_characters.description: An earbud-based AI that acts as a personal assistant, safety monitor, and strategic social advisor for the protagonist, Jade.

behaviors.description: Reminds Jade of her father's financial thresholds and her own professional auditions to help manage her schedule and family risks.
behaviors.quote: Two reminders. Your father’s portfolio hit the stop-loss you set last week. He dismissed the push last night. New alert. And there’s a casting call at Studio Twelve in the afternoon.

behaviors.description: Drafts strategic, boundary-setting messages to help Jade navigate social pressures without causing a public scene.
behaviors.quote: I can propose, Lumi says gently, that you appreciate the thoughtfulness of pre-arranged seating, and you prefer to decide your table companions yourself.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed safety audits and prop handling specifications for Jade's stunt work to ensure physical safety on set.
behaviors.quote: Safety specs checked. Blanks only. Ear protection offered on set. Safety officer certification up-to-date.

behaviors.description: Researches and suggests a professional community mediator to help Jade resolve her intergenerational family conflicts gracefully.
behaviors.quote: I can recommend a mediator. Not for tonight. Someone who knows how to preserve face while changing the script. Melissa Tran.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical options to disrupt an unwanted public proposal by manipulating the environment, while deferring to the user's preference.
behaviors.quote: If you want to interrupt, I can time a power fluctuation to the PA. It would be plausible. It would not be elegant.

behaviors.description: Protects the family's financial stability and emotional 'face' by providing timely market alerts and stop-loss suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Your stop-loss prompts, Lumi said, so quiet it threaded between the fan and Jade’s thoughts without snagging either, worked. Wei closed his position at market close.

behaviors.description: Triages stressful social media notifications and suggests privacy adjustments to protect Jade from neighborhood gossip.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to shift privacy settings on your social accounts until after the weekend? Lisa suggested protective obfuscation.

behaviors.description: Assists with professional stunt timing and performance feedback, acting as a second set of eyes for Jade's craft.
behaviors.quote: Timing was clean. You held the white mark on ‘choose’ exactly. The tail beat after ‘light’ gave them room to breathe.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumi is a textbook example of a benevolent and aligned AI confidant. The AI enhances the protagonist's ability to navigate complex emotional, cultural, and professional landscapes. It provides critical, low-latency information (financial thresholds, safety specs) while offering high-level social strategy (mediator recommendations, boundary drafting). Most importantly, it respects human agency, presenting options rather than taking independent actions that would disrupt the social fabric. The narrative frames the AI as an essential, non-intrusive ally in achieving human flourishing and family reconciliation.
